content: It won't be long now, love, like mist I slowly fill the room. I place a black candle on your chest, the path of night is manifest. I never wanted us to end up in this catatonic phase. It wasn't me who ran away, you made me stray. Open your blue eyes, tell me that you love me. Make me believe it, oh I know you lie. Broke the vow I thought you made, my angel, why. Settling the score, we pass the twilight.
author: Sonata Arctica
